price: Edhe te fisi Themud (ka mësim), kur iu tha anëtarëve të tij: “Kënaquni njëfarë kohe!”
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
